scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && mkdir build && mkdir dist
scripts.copy-static: cp -r src/* dist && cp -r static/* build
scripts.build-css: npx tailwindcss-cli build ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css && cp dist/styles.css build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static && npm run build-css && tsc && npm run gabble
